amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that in the event that the average annual rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) growth remains below 5 percent over the first four calendar quarters occurring after the date of enactment of H.R. 50, then the statutory changes made by the bill would be repealed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 62).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 62).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
